content: Rafael is one of the most creative and productive people I know. Also, the technical quality of what he builds is enviable. He always brings something new in his side projects. Heâ€™s a person that practices and reflects a lot about his profession. The results are evident.

Rafael was responsible to introduce a new approach on how we organised JavaScript code on Jobscore. He is one of the best engineers I had the privilege to work with. I think his best trait is making sure that everything is reusable, easy to understand and maintainable.
